conference.name: DevCon 2024
conference.description: Premier developer conference showcasing the latest in software development, cloud computing, and emerging technologies.

session.title: Modern Frontend Development: React, Vue, and Beyond
session.speaker: Emma Davis
session.summary: A comprehensive overview of the modern frontend development landscape, comparing popular frameworks and their ecosystem. Emma Davis provides practical guidance on choosing between React, Vue, Angular, and emerging frameworks like Svelte and Solid. The session covers component architecture patterns, state management solutions, and performance optimization techniques. Key topics include server-side rendering, static site generation, and the jamstack approach. The presentation includes live coding demonstrations showing how to build performant, accessible web applications using modern tools and techniques. Attendees will gain insights into tooling, testing strategies, and deployment best practices for contemporary frontend applications.
